page.title: 01LIFE STYLES
page.content:
{ {BRACO} pop Approx 950
Situated just off the A9,between Dunblane and Crieff,{BRACO}is a pleasant farming community with some new housing areas.Its main industries are potatoes and farming and it is also famous for its {ROMAN FORT.}It has one primary school with about 50 children,but the secondary school is Crieff High.The nearest railway station is at Dunblane but there is a bus service.There are 5 shops and a post office.The doctor's surgery is in Dunblane but he visits three times a week. {BRACO}is a nice peaceful village.
